languages.text: "Когда-то я читала в "Хрониках Амалинского конклава" о мистических чудесах, что наблюдали истово верующие на молениях у древнего знамени святого Капия... Если Горнило явит чудо веры, ни у кого не останется сомнений в том, что это святыня, а не собственность Механикус".

"I believe that the Chronicles of the Amalinian Conclave describe mystical miracles witnessed by zealots while praying at an ancient banner of Saint Capius... Should the Crucible perform a similar miracle, then no doubts will remain that it is indeed a holy relic and not the property of the Adeptus Mechanicus."
languages.original_text: "Когда-то я читала в "Хрониках Амалинского конклава" о мистических чудесах, что наблюдали истово верующие на молениях у древнего знамени святого Капия... Если Горнило явит чудо веры, ни у кого не останется сомнений в том, что это святыня, а не собственность Механикус".

traits.locale_text: "I have read about the mystical miracles that had been witnessed zealots during the prayers at the ancient banner of Saint Capius In the 'Chronicles of the Amalinian Conclave'... If the Crucible would manifest a miracle, then everyone will know for sure that it is a relic and not the property of the crimson brotherhood."

"I have read about the mystical miracles that had been witnessed zealots during the prayers at the ancient banner of Saint Capius In the 'Chronicles of the Amalinian Conclave'... If the Crucible would manifest a miracle, then everyone will know for sure that it is a relic and not the property of the crimson brotherhood."

"I believe that the Chronicles of the Amalinian Conclave describe mystical miracles witnessed by zealots while praying at an ancient banner of Saint Capius... Should the Crucible perform a similar miracle, then no doubts will remain that it is indeed a holy relic and not the property of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

"I believe that the Chronicles of the Amalinian Conclave describe mystical miracles witnessed by zealots while praying at an ancient banner of Saint Capius... Should the Crucible perform a similar miracle, then no doubts will remain that it is indeed a holy relic and not the property of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

"I believe that the Chronicles of the Amalinian Conclave describe mystical miracles witnessed by zealots while praying at an ancient banner of Saint Capius... Should the Crucible perform a similar miracle, then no doubts will remain that it is indeed a holy relic and not the property of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

"I believe that the Chronicles of the Amalinian Conclave describe mystical miracles witnessed by zealots while praying at an ancient banner of Saint Capius... Should the Crucible perform a similar miracle, then no doubts will remain that it is indeed a holy relic and not the property of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

languages.text: “我记得《阿马利亚密会编年史》描述过，狂热信徒在古老的圣卡皮乌斯的旗帜下祈祷时，见证了神秘的奇迹……如果熔炉也能创造类似的奇迹，那么毫无疑问，它确实是一件圣物，而不是机械修会的财产。”
languages.original_text: "I believe that the Chronicles of the Amalinian Conclave describe mystical miracles witnessed by zealots while praying at an ancient banner of Saint Capius... Should the Crucible perform a similar miracle, then no doubts will remain that it is indeed a holy relic and not the property of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: “我记得《阿马利亚密会编年史》描述过，狂热信徒在古老的圣卡皮乌斯的旗帜下祈祷时，见证了神秘的奇迹……如果熔炉也能创造类似的奇迹，那么毫无疑问，它确实是一件圣物，而不是机械修会的财产。”

languages.text: «Creo que las Crónicas del Cónclave Amaliniano describen milagros místicos presenciados por fanáticos mientras rezaban ante un antiguo estandarte de San Capio... Si el Crisol realiza un milagro similar, no quedarán dudas de que es una reliquia sagrada y no propiedad del Adeptus Mechanicus».
languages.original_text: "I believe that the Chronicles of the Amalinian Conclave describe mystical miracles witnessed by zealots while praying at an ancient banner of Saint Capius... Should the Crucible perform a similar miracle, then no doubts will remain that it is indeed a holy relic and not the property of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: «Creo que las Crónicas del Cónclave Amaliniano describen milagros místicos presenciados por fanáticos mientras rezaban ante un antiguo estandarte de San Capio... Si el Crisol realiza un milagro similar, no quedarán dudas de que es una reliquia sagrada y no propiedad del Adeptus Mechanicus».

languages.text: 「アマリニアン評議会の年代記には、聖カピウスの古代の旗に祈りを捧げる狂信者たちが目撃した神秘的な奇跡が記されているのではなかろうか...坩堝が同じような奇跡を起こせば、それが本当に聖遺物であり、帝国技術局の所有物ではないことを疑う余地はなくなる」
languages.original_text: "I believe that the Chronicles of the Amalinian Conclave describe mystical miracles witnessed by zealots while praying at an ancient banner of Saint Capius... Should the Crucible perform a similar miracle, then no doubts will remain that it is indeed a holy relic and not the property of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: 「アマリニアン評議会の年代記には、聖カピウスの古代の旗に祈りを捧げる狂信者たちが目撃した神秘的な奇跡が記されているのではなかろうか...坩堝が同じような奇跡を起こせば、それが本当に聖遺物であり、帝国技術局の所有物ではないことを疑う余地はなくなる」

languages.text: « Je crois savoir que les Chroniques du Conclave d'Amalinia décrivent des miracles dont furent témoins des zélotes mystiques, alors qu'ils priaient au pied d'une antique bannière de Saint Capius... Si le Creuset venait à réaliser un miracle similaire, il ne fera plus aucun doute qu'il s'agit bien d'une relique sacrée et non d'une vulgaire possession matérielle de l'Adeptus Mechanicus. »
languages.original_text: "I believe that the Chronicles of the Amalinian Conclave describe mystical miracles witnessed by zealots while praying at an ancient banner of Saint Capius... Should the Crucible perform a similar miracle, then no doubts will remain that it is indeed a holy relic and not the property of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: « Je crois savoir que les Chroniques du Conclave d'Amalinia décrivent des miracles dont furent témoins des zélotes mystiques, alors qu'ils priaient au pied d'une antique bannière de Saint Capius... Si le Creuset venait à réaliser un miracle similaire, il ne fera plus aucun doute qu'il s'agit bien d'une relique sacrée et non d'une vulgaire possession matérielle de l'Adeptus Mechanicus. »

languages.text: "Ich glaube, dass die Chroniken der Amalinischen Konklave mystische Wunder beschreiben, die Eiferer beim Gebet vor einem uralten Banner des Heiligen Capius erlebt haben ... Sollte der Tiegel ein ähnliches Wunder wirken, dann bestehen keine Zweifel, dass er tatsächlich eine heilige Reliquie ist und nicht das Eigentum des Adeptus Mechanicus."
languages.original_text: "I believe that the Chronicles of the Amalinian Conclave describe mystical miracles witnessed by zealots while praying at an ancient banner of Saint Capius... Should the Crucible perform a similar miracle, then no doubts will remain that it is indeed a holy relic and not the property of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: "Ich glaube, dass die Chroniken der Amalinischen Konklave mystische Wunder beschreiben, die Eiferer beim Gebet vor einem uralten Banner des Heiligen Capius erlebt haben ... Sollte der Tiegel ein ähnliches Wunder wirken, dann bestehen keine Zweifel, dass er tatsächlich eine heilige Reliquie ist und nicht das Eigentum des Adeptus Mechanicus."

languages.text: "Sanıyorum ki Amalinia Meclisi'nin Vakayinameleri'nde Aziz Capius'un kadim sancağı altında dua eden bağnazların tanık olduğu gizemli mucizeler tanımlanmıştır... Pota, eğer ki benzer bir mucize gerçekleştirebilirse Adeptus Mechanicus'a ait bir mal olmadığını kanıtlar ve böylece onun kutsal bir yadigâr olduğuna dair hiçbir kuşku kalmaz."
languages.original_text: "I believe that the Chronicles of the Amalinian Conclave describe mystical miracles witnessed by zealots while praying at an ancient banner of Saint Capius... Should the Crucible perform a similar miracle, then no doubts will remain that it is indeed a holy relic and not the property of the Adeptus Mechanicus."
